Uses of Interface
common.MetadataStrategy

  • Packages that use MetadataStrategy 
    Package Description
    common
    Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.
    heif
    Provides high-level classes for parsing and manipulating HEIF-based files.
    jpg
    Classes for parsing and manipulating JPEG-based files are found here.
    png
    Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.
    tif
    Classes for parsing and manipulating TIFF-based files.
    webp  
    xmp  

    • Uses of MetadataStrategy in common

      Classes in common with type parameters of type MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  MetadataContext<T extends MetadataStrategy<?>>
      A context class that acts as a wrapper for a MetadataStrategy, providing a simplified interface for clients to interact with various types of metadata.
      Subinterfaces of MetadataStrategy in common 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IccStrategy<D extends Directory<?>> 
      Fields in common declared as MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private T MetadataContext.strategy 
      Methods in common that return MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract MetadataStrategy<?> AbstractImageParser.getMetadata()
      Retrieves the extracted metadata from the provided image file.

    • Uses of MetadataStrategy in heif

      Methods in heif that return MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MetadataStrategy<DirectoryIFD> HeifParser.getMetadata()
      Retrieves the extracted metadata from the HEIF image file, or a fallback if unavailable.

    • Uses of MetadataStrategy in jpg

      Methods in jpg that return MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MetadataStrategy<DirectoryIFD> JpgParser.getMetadata()
      Retrieves the extracted Exif metadata from the JPG image file, or a fallback if unavailable.

    • Uses of MetadataStrategy in png

      Subinterfaces of MetadataStrategy in png 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  PngMetadataStrategy 
      Classes in png that implement MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PngMetadata
      Implements the PngMetadataStrategy interface to provide a comprehensive view and extraction capability for metadata embedded within a PNG file.
      Methods in png that return MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MetadataStrategy<PngDirectory> PngParser.getMetadata()
      Retrieves the extracted metadata from the PNG image file, or an empty fallback if unavailable.

    • Uses of MetadataStrategy in tif

      Subinterfaces of MetadataStrategy in tif 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  TifMetadataStrategy 
      Classes in tif that implement MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  TifMetadata
      A concrete metadata strategy for managing a collection of metadata, including EXIF and potentially XMP metadata.
      Methods in tif that return MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MetadataStrategy<DirectoryIFD> TifParser.getMetadata()
      Retrieves the extracted metadata, or a safe fallback if unavailable.

    • Uses of MetadataStrategy in webp

      Methods in webp that return MetadataStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
